content.rendered:
For students taking pre-Advanced Placement, Advanced Placement, or collegiate level courses with assigned work, you will find 2025 summer assignments for each course below. 

AP Calculus BC

AP Calculus BC Summer Assignment

AP Biology

AP Biology Summer Assignment

AP Chemistry

AP Chemistry Summer Assignment

AP Language (11) 

AP Literature (11) Summer Reading

AP Literature (12)

AP Literature (12) Summer Reading

Please check back for additional course assignments.
